Title: Curiosity Killed the Kat
Plot: The law catches up with the crafty Hustle conmen when corrupt police officer DI Fisk is bribed into bringing them down. Unaware of Fisk?s watchful eye, the gang moves in on their latest mark, Linda Runcorn, the crooked CEO of an online hotel and restaurant guide. Meanwhile, Fisk arrests Sean?s ex-girlfriend, pickpocket Kat, on false charges, blackmailing her to spy on the team so he can catch them.
